scripts.backend:win: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt && venv\Scripts\python app.py
scripts.backend:mac: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && venv/bin/python app.py
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install:deps: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
